Interdisciplinary Studies - New Media and Communications, Minor in Contemporary English Literature

Self-created major within Interdisciplinary Field Studies department exploring online communications, the sociological and psychological impact of online communities, and technology that was reshaping the way people lived and worked. This work sparked a lifelong passion for understanding and building for the intersection of our digital and physical worlds.Senior Thesis entitled: Virtual Communities: Creation and Development of Dual Identities

recommendations: Lawrence Coburn
Chief Strategy Officer at DoubleDutch
January 24, 2017, Lawrence managed Annie directly

Annie joined us in 2014 as our Chief Customer Officer, and was our first legitimate taste of a next level exec.  We were in the middle of hyper growth, and it was breaking us.  Annie stepped in and put in people, process, and tools and seemingly overnight, stabilized the ship.  In addition to her elite work on the Customer Experience side, Annie was more than that - she was (and is) a strong woman exec who inspired many across DoubleDutch, and she also was instrumental in making DD a much more family place to work.  People love working for Annie, and her young leaders thrived under her.  I said to her on her last day that “we expect greatness from you” - and that is the truth.

Jennifer Ottovegio
Head of Product Marketing and Demand Generation
April 28, 2016, Jennifer worked with Annie in different groups

Simply put, Annie has the vision, action, and follow-through that makes a great leader. She is a fabulous addition to our C suite -- a professional over-achiever with an empathetic and strong leadership style that is hard to find. She believes in growing and developing her people, which makes her well-loved. She also is able to rally people together to get an impressive volume of work done, with clear expectations, timelines, and goals set and shared in advance. Any problem that comes up, I trust that Annie has the strength and determination to solve it.Annie doesn't think about customer success in a silo. With a broader knowledge of marketing, account management, operations, and SaaS business models, she is incredibly capable leader and doer. It would be an honor to work with her again!

summary: I founded EdioLabs to fill a gap in the learner experience that parents and educators experience on a daily basis. Have worn a lot of hats over the years - writer, salesperson, speaker, sales engineer, marketeer, artist, student, mentor, strategist, executive, storyteller. Very much enjoying being a builder during this chapter of the book.
